name: Squid Delicacy
details: This is a delicious and simple recipe for squid. Lightly coated in sea salt and pepper seasoned flour and then fried to perfection. Perfect for a hot summer's meal served with a fresh garden salad.

name: Chicken Gourmet
details: This is a delicious and simple recipe for chicken gourment. Lightly coated in sea salt and pepper seasoned flour and then fried to perfection. Perfect for a hot summer's meal served with a fresh garden salad.

name: Steak Mignon
details: This is a delicious and simple recipe for steak mignon. Lightly coated in sea salt and pepper seasoned flour and then fried to perfection. Perfect for a hot summer's meal served with a fresh garden salad.
